<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="annexSkin" width="1280" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="158281559f1" ></w:Config>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="AsideSkin" width="600" height="150" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="15765981be4" ></w:Config>
	<e:Image source="choose1_png" x="0" y="0" width="600" height="150" scale9Grid="26,14,216,39"/>
	<e:Label id="asidetext" text="旁白" x="19" y="17" width="564" height="119" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="Attribute" width="1280" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Config id="157d5b42393"/>
	<e:Rect width="1283" height="430" x="0" y="147" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" fillColor="0xf3e4e5"/>
	<e:Label text="好感度与属性值" x="507" y="193" height="48" size="38" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" textColor="0x600809"/>
	<e:Label id="qingLabel" text="标签" x="148" y="307" height="194" size="40" width="74" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" textColor="0x600809"/>
	<e:Label id="siLabel" text="标签" x="317" y="307" height="194" size="40" width="74" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" textColor="0x600809"/>
	<e:Label id="liuLabel" text="标签" x="507" y="307" height="194" size="40" width="74" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" textColor="0x600809"/>
	<e:Label id="forceLabel" text="标签" x="781" y="307" height="194" size="40" width="74" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" textColor="0x600809"/>
	<e:Label id="witLabel" text="标签" x="967" y="307" height="194" size="40" width="74" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" textColor="0x600809"/>
	<e:Label id="popLabel" text="标签" x="1152" y="307" height="194" size="40" width="74" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" textColor="0x600809"/>
	<e:Image source="properties_json.property1" x="426" y="220"/>
	<e:Image source="properties_json.property2" x="243" y="222"/>
	<e:Image source="properties_json.property3" x="74" y="224"/>
	<e:Image source="properties_json.property4" x="898" y="231"/>
	<e:Image source="properties_json.property6" x="712" y="228"/>
	<e:Image source="properties_json.property5" x="1082" y="225"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="CartoonSkin" width="1280" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="157cb333c7e" ></w:Config>
	<e:Group id="skip" width="124" height="76" x="1160" y="32" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
		<e:Label text="跳过>>" x="-9" y="0" width="132" height="76" size="40" textColor="0x0b0001"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="current" width="1024" height="8960" y="0" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Image source="1_jpg" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image source="2_jpg" x="0" y="640" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image source="3_jpg" x="0" y="1280" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image source="4_jpg" x="0" y="1920" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image source="5_jpg" x="0" y="2560" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image source="6_jpg" x="0" y="3200" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image source="7_jpg" x="0" y="3840" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image source="8_jpg" x="0" y="4480" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image source="9_jpg" x="0" y="5120" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image source="10_jpg" x="0" y="5760" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image source="11_jpg" x="0" y="6400" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image source="12_jpg" x="0" y="7040" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image source="13_jpg" x="0" y="7680" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image source="14_jpg" x="0" y="8320" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="DialogSkin" width="1280" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="1575c6ca960" ></w:Config>
	<e:Group id="dialogbox" height="266" width="1280" bottom="0">
	<e:Image source="choose1_png" left="0"  y="0"/>
	<e:Image source="dialog1_png" bottom="0" x="0"/>
	<e:Label id="dialog" text="对话内容" bottom="26"  width="829" height="144" x="24"/>
	<e:Label id="person" text="姓名"  left="19" top="3" height="57" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" width="227"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="select1" width="400" height="65" x="440" y="100" visible="false">
	<e:Image source="choose1_png" scale9Grid="25,8,213,49" width="400"/>
    <e:Label id="selection1" text="选择一" width="358" height="60" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" size="20" x="21" y="2"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="select2" width="400" height="65" x="440" y="200" visible="false">
		<e:Image source="choose1_png" scale9Grid="25,8,213,49" width="400"/>
		<e:Label id="selection2" text="选择一" width="358" height="60" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" size="20" x="21" y="2"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="select3" width="400" height="65" x="440" y="300" visible="false">
		<e:Image source="choose1_png" scale9Grid="25,8,213,49" width="400"/>
		<e:Label id="selection3" text="选择一" width="358" height="60" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" size="20" x="21" y="2"/>
	</e:Group>
	

</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameFileSkin" width="320" height="180" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="157713cdfc9" ></w:Config>
	<e:Image id="file_sc" source="file_jpg" x="0" y="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameOverSkin" width="1280" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="1576700c29e" ></w:Config>
	<e:Rect  width="1280" height="720" x="0" y="0"/>
	<!--<e:Label text="游戏结束，进行判定" x="426.00000000000006" y="194" width="854" height="333" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>-->
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameSettingSkin" width="1280" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image scale9Grid="17,8,196,51" width="400" height="255" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-8.5" source="MoneyBG_png"/>
    <e:Button id="btn_agree" y="407" horizontalCenter="4.5">
        <e:skinName>
            <e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
                <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="YesBtn_jpg" source.down="YesBtn1_jpg"/>
                <e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
            </e:Skin>
        </e:skinName>
    </e:Button>
    <e:Group width="102" height="94" x="508" y="300">
        <e:Button id="btn_music" y="0" x="0">
            <e:skinName>
                <e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
                    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_music_png" source.down="btn_music_down_png"/>
                    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
                </e:Skin>
            </e:skinName>
        </e:Button>
        <e:Image id="img_music_disable" x="6" y="2" source="btn_disable_png" touchEnabled="false"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Group x="708" y="300" width="98" height="94">
        <e:Button id="btn_sound" y="0" x="0">
            <e:skinName>
                <e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
                    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_sound_png" source.down="btn_sound_down_png"/>
                    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
                </e:Skin>
            </e:skinName>
        </e:Button>
        <e:Image id="img_sound_disable" y="2" x="6" source="btn_disable_png" touchEnabled="false"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Label text="设置" y="244" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="MenuSkin" width="1280" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="157d57a7581" ></w:Config>
	<e:Rect width="502" height="255" x="389" y="197" fillAlpha="1" strokeColor="0xf7ebeb"/>
	<e:Image id="attributes" source="attributes_png" x="792" y="281" width="80" height="80"/>
	<e:Image id="read" source="read_png" x="402" y="281" width="80" height="80"/>
	<e:Image id="save" source="save_png" x="531" y="281" width="80" height="80"/>
	<e:Image id="letter" source="letter_png" x="663" y="281" width="80" height="80"/>
	<e:Label text="读档" x="414" y="384" size="28" height="32" width="59"/>
	<e:Label text="存档" x="545" y="385" size="28" width="56" height="50"/>
	<e:Label text="来信" x="677" y="385" size="28" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
	<e:Label text="属性" x="806" y="387" size="28" height="58"/>
	<e:Label text="菜单" x="522" y="209" width="236" height="72" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="SaveFileSkin" width="1280" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*"  height="720">
	<e:Rect width="1280" height="720" x="0" y="0"/>
	
	<e:Label id="title" text="存档" x="530" y="61" width="222" height="60" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Image id="menu" source="menu_png" x="1162" y="31" width="60" height="60"/>
	<ns1:GameFile id="file1" x="210" y="178" skinName="GameFileSkin"/>
	<ns1:GameFile id="file2" x="750" y="440" skinName="GameFileSkin"/>
	<ns1:GameFile id="file3" x="210" y="440" skinName="GameFileSkin"/>
	<ns1:GameFile id="file4" x="750" y="178" skinName="GameFileSkin" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
	
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="SceneBeginSkin" width="1280" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<e:Image source="main_jpg"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_begin" x="298" y="527">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="start_png" source.down="start_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="SceneBlockSkin" width="1280" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*" >
	<w:Config id="157577a7fc2" ></w:Config>
	<e:Image id="scene" source="1block_jpg"/>
	<ns1:annex id="ann" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
	<ns1:Aside id="aside" x="340" y="260" skinName="AsideSkin" visible="false"/>
	<ns1:Dialog id="dialogbox" x="0" y="0" skinName="DialogSkin" visible="false"/>
	<e:Image id="figure" source="heroine_png" bottom="0" right="0" visible="false"/>
	<e:Rect id="touchRect" width="1280" height="248" x="0" y="474" fillAlpha="0" strokeWeight="0"/>
	<e:Image id="btn_setting" source="setting_png" x="1171" y="11" width="80" height="80"/>
	<e:Image id="menu" source="menu_png" x="1061" y="11" width="80" height="80"/>
</e:Skin>
